main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Jeffersonville, Ohio on August 1, 1966, involving one unidentified light in the sky.
interesting points: The object was observed for 1 minute and was described as a beam of light resembling a searchlight., No physical evidence or photographs were collected related to the sighting., The object reportedly moved straight and had no definite form visible., Witnesses noted that three red lights formed a triangle after the beam of light disappeared., The confusion led to the conclusion that it might have been an aircraft.
sighted object: a beam of light or searchlight in the sky
witness description: A father, brother, and another individual agreed upon the information regarding the sighting.
